trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Pasadena
There were no other sightings in Pasadena on or around March 5th 2008
Summary: One light that would seem to stay white for 10 seconds but then pulsate I believe blue
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in my driveway smoking a ciggarette looking for UFO's of course and a star-like light caught my eye. I knew it was'nt an ordinary air-craft when I noticed it did not blink. It was moving at the speed of an airplane. It shined the color of white for I believe ten seconds but then it would pulsate I believe the color blue. I was hoping that it would stop and hover but It was heading southeast from maryland. I felt glorified and excited but then I became a little sick. I lost sight of the object when it flew behind some trees.
